name: Music Rewind
description:
My submission for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme of rewind.

You are taken to the land of the cassettes where all music is stored. Unfortunately some of the tapes have holes in them, and it is up to you to recover the music. Every level you are faced with a puzzle. The only way to pass is to collect all three tape pieces. But you have a secret weapon to help you conquer the level, you can rewind the music. Rewinding the music will reverse everything in the level helping you reach your goal. Well, what are you waiting for? Recover my music!

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

R: Switch between rewind and normal

Q: Restart the level

Link to the music used in the game:

"Fix the Gear" Composed by Oscar Owl: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ObtLQJVCD5w
